sqlMap.select: SELECT G_PERMESSI.NUMPER, USRSYS.SYSCON, USRSYS.syslogin, USRSYS.SYSUTE, G_PERMESSI.AUTORI, G_PERMESSI.PROPRI, G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ as VALORECHIAVE, G_PERMESSI.MERUOLO, USRSYS.MERUOLO as RUOLOUSRSYS, USRSYS.SYSDISAB FROM USRSYS, G_PERMESSI WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = G_PERMESSI.SYSCON AND USRSYS.SYSCON = #idAccount# AND G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ = #valoreChiave# ORDER BY USRSYS.SYSUTE

SELECT G_PERMESSI.NUMPER, USRSYS.SYSCON, USRSYS.syslogin, USRSYS.SYSUTE, G_PERMESSI.AUTORI, G_PERMESSI.PROPRI, G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ as VALORECHIAVE, G_PERMESSI.MERUOLO, USRSYS.MERUOLO as RUOLOUSRSYS, USRSYS.SYSDISAB FROM USRSYS, G_PERMESSI WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = G_PERMESSI.SYSCON AND G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ = #valoreChiave# ORDER BY USRSYS.SYSUTE

SELECT G_PERMESSI.NUMPER, USRSYS.SYSCON as SYSCON, USRSYS.syslogin, USRSYS.SYSUTE, G_PERMESSI.AUTORI, G_PERMESSI.PROPRI,
CAST(G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ AS VARCHAR(30)) as VALORECHIAVE
NULL as VALORECHIAVE
,G_PERMESSI.MERUOLO, USRSYS.MERUOLO as RUOLOUSRSYS, USRSYS.SYSDISAB FROM USRSYS, G_PERMESSI
, USR_EIN
WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = G_PERMESSI.SYSCON AND G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ = #valoreChiave#
AND USR_EIN.SYSCON = USRSYS.SYSCON AND CODEIN=#codein#
AND (USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP IS NULL OR USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP=(SELECT SYSUFFAPP FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = #idAccount#) OR (USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP IS NOT NULL AND (SELECT SYSUFFAPP FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = #idAccount#) IS NULL)) UNION SELECT
CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(12)),
NULL,
USRSYS.SYSCON as SYSCON, USRSYS.syslogin, USRSYS.SYSUTE,
CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(7)), CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1)), CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(30)),CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(7)),
NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,
USRSYS.MERUOLO as RUOLOUSRSYS, USRSYS.SYSDISAB FROM USRSYS
, USR_EIN
WHERE
USR_EIN.SYSCON = USRSYS.SYSCON AND CODEIN=#codein# and (
(USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP IS NULL OR USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP=(SELECT SYSUFFAPP FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = #idAccount#) OR (USRSYS.SYSUFFAPP IS NOT NULL AND (SELECT SYSUFFAPP FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = #idAccount#) IS NULL)) AND USRSYS.SYSCON NOT IN ( SELECT USRSYS.SYSCON FROM USRSYS, G_PERMESSI WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = G_PERMESSI.SYSCON AND G_PERMESSI.$campoChiave$ = #valoreChiave#)
)
AND (USRSYS.SYSDISAB is null or USRSYS.SYSDISAB !='1') ORDER BY SYSUTE
